name: react-starter
description: A good starting point for a react js app.

scripts.server-w: DEBUG=sprinthive:* PORT=3006 nodemon --watch server --watch lib server/server.js
scripts.subscriptions-w: DEBUG=sprinthive:* PORT=3007 nodemon --watch services/subscriptions --watch lib --ignore services/subscriptions/offset.json services/subscriptions/subscriptions.js
scripts.auth-w: DEBUG=sprinthive:* PORT=3009 nodemon --watch services/auth --watch lib --ignore services/auth/offset.json services/auth/auth.js
scripts.entity-w: DEBUG=sprinthive:* PORT=3008 nodemon --watch services/entity --watch lib --ignore services/entity/offset.json services/entity/entity.js

author: Jon Lai Lam
